item.title: 2020 April Fool's Puzzle Competition Is Now LIVE
item.description:
We are happy to present the 2020 #ircpuzzles April Fool's Puzzle Competition on freenode! It has begun!

The first clue is: V2VEb250TGV0Q09WSUQxOVJ1aW5BRlA=

Please join us in #ircpuzzles on freenode.
item.dc:creator: yano

item.title: 2020 April Fool's Puzzle Competition
item.description:
The 2020 #ircpuzzles' April Fool's Puzzle Competition will begin on 2020-04-01 00:01 UTC!

We will announce the first clue in #ircpuzzles on chat.freenode, on our website, and on our Twitter handle @ircpuzzles.
item.dc:creator: yano

item.title: 2017 April Fool\'s Day (AFD) Competition
item.description:
Glad 2016 is over? Well, we are happy to present the 2017 IRCPuzzles April Fool's Day Challenge on freenode! It will begin at 2017-04-01 12:00 UTC (noon).

The first clue for Level 0 will be released in #ircpuzzles on freenode and on our Twitter page, @ircpuzzles.

Join us in …
item.dc:creator: yano

item.title: Announcement: 2016 Competition!
item.description:
We are happy to present the 2016 IRCPuzzles April Fool's Day Challenge on freenode! It will begin at 2016-04-01 12:00 UTC (noon).

The first clue for Level 0 will be released at least on our Twitter page of @ircpuzzles. It may also be released or announced via the freenode …
